name: Laqueus Escape - Chapter I.
description:
You find yourself in a strange place. How did you get here? Is there a way out? You must look around, find clues, use random objects and solve puzzles to make your way out in this escape room game.

Click and drag mouse to look around, click to examine places of interests. To use an item click to select it in the inventory, then click the place where you want to use it. Double click inventory items to zoom.
